name: TERMINATED
description:
TERMINATED runs best offline.
For better web performance, try a Chromium-based browser.

TERMINATED

Slay robots in this top-down arena shooter inspired by Devil Daggers by Sorath and 2DDD by Bintr.

TERMINATED (including all code, art, and music) was created by Aaron Friesen. The source code and assets are available on GitHub.

Instructions
  • [R] to start
  • [ESC] to quit
  • [WASD] to move
  • Hold [LMB] to shoot
  • Tap [LMB] for shotgun
  • [RMB] for laser
  • [SCROLL] to zoom
  • [F] to toggle FPS

Currently, disabling fullscreen on Windows does not work. I suspect this may be an underlying bug in Godot.

Share your best time in the comments below!
